channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Cloud Pak for Applications
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Cloud Pak for Applications

item.title: CVE-2021-20423|2024-09-16T18:49:16.171Z -- ibm -- cloud%20pak%20for%20applications
item.description: IBM Cloud Pak for Applications 4.3 could allow an authenticated user gain escalated privilesges due to improper application permissions. IBM X-Force ID: 196308.

item.title: CVE-2021-20363|2024-09-16T17:08:01.623Z -- ibm -- cloud%20pak%20for%20applications
item.description: IBM Cloud Pak for Applications 4.3 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 195034.

item.title: CVE-2021-20366|2024-09-16T16:28:29.564Z -- ibm -- cloud%20pak%20for%20applications
item.description: IBM Cloud Pak for Applications 4.3 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 195037.
